Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-44487 affecting package kubevirt for versions less than 0.59.0-9
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-44487 affecting package kubevirt for versions less than 0.59.0-9. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package kubevirt is earlier than 0.59.0-9, affected by CVE-2023-44487
